dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes in detail the communal life at St. Benedict's farming commune in Australia and their emphasis on the primacy of the spiritual. Notes similarities and differences to the CW farms.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 503 1970-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
